welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nijlen, Belgium! Known for its picturesque countryside and charming small-town atmosphere, we invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
